content: soft crochet capelet skill level easy size one size - approx 40 circumference at upper arm 14 long materials 240 yds soft fuzzy novelty yarn rayon/nylon/acrylic blend sample shown in online linie 43 punta size p/16 11 5 mm and k/10 5 6 5 mm crochet hooks tapestry needle gauge 6 double_crochet in pattern i e double_crochet worked in spaces between each double_crochet = 4 using size p/16 11 5 mm hook stitches/terms beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase increase single_crochet single_crochet repeat repeat round round slip_stitch slip_stitch space space pattern notes capelet is worked from the neck down due to the fuzziness of the yarn it may be difficult to see where to insert the hook in the foundation chain and body of the piece so stitches are worked in the spaces between each double_crochet instead of in the top two loops of each stitch special stitches increase increase work double_crochet-chain 1-double_crochet all in same space 1 capelet with larger hook chain 40 loosely join into ring being careful not to twist chain round 1 chain 3 double_crochet in ea chain around join with slip_stitch to top of beginning chain-3 40 double_crochet round 2 slip_stitch into first space chain 3 double_crochet in each of next 3 spaces increase in next space *double_crochet in each of next 4 sps increase in next space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 48 double_crochet round 3 slip_stitch into first space chain 3 double_crochet in ea space around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 48 double_crochet round 4 slip_stitch into first space chain 3 double_crochet in ea of next 4 sps increase in next space *double_crochet in ea of next 5 sps increase in next space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 56 double_crochet round 5 slip_stitch into first space chain 3 double_crochet in ea space around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 56 double_crochet round 6 slip_stitch into first space chain 3 double_crochet in ea of next 5 sps increase in next space *double_crochet in next 6 sps increase in next space repeat from * around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 64 double_crochet round 7 slip_stitch into first space chain 3 double_crochet in ea space around 64 double_crochet rnds 8-14 repeat round 7 64 double_crochet last round chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in ea space around fasten_off and weave in ends finishing neck edging turn capelet upside down attach yarn to any space along neckline chain 1 work 2 single_crochet in ea space around fasten_off and weave in ends flowers make 3 with smaller hook chain 6 join into ring round 1 chain 1 work 12 single_crochet in ring join with slip_stitch 12 single_crochet round 2 chain 4 skip 1 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet *chain 4 skip 1 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 6 chain-4 loops round 3 slip_stitch into first loop chain 1 work single_crochet
